content: hello kitty crochet pattern materials - worsted yarn i use simply soft white/pink/yw - polyester fiber filling - tapestry needle and stitch marker hook size 3 5mm e hook terms single_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch fo = fasten_off/finish chain = chain st = stitch bsc = back loop only single_crochet blo/back loop only fsc = front loop only single_crochet flo/front loop only decrease = decrease / make 1 single_crochet over next two stitches increase = increase / make 2 single_crochet on the same stitch approx 5 tall ^^ let s begin with kitty color white … head… th chain 5+1 total 6 chains the 6 chain is the height of first round round 1 start from 5th chain as shown above 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc make 3 single_crochet in number 1 chain and continue work on bottom chain 1sc 1sc 1sc make 2sc in bottom of number 5 chain then slip_stitch to the first single_crochet to form a round chain 1 total 12 single_crochet stitches round 2 make 2sc in first stitch increase then 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase 2sc increase slip_stitch to beginning stitch and chain one put the stitch marker at the last single_crochet stitch total 18 sts round 3 make 2sc increase then 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase move stitch marker slip_stitch chain 1 total 26 sts round 4 repeat *1sc* 9 times then repeat *2sc increase * 4 times repeat *1sc* 9 times then repeat *2sc increase * 4 times move stitch marker slip_stitch chain 1 total 34 sts round 5~13 make 1sc in each stitch around at last single_crochet move the stitch marker and then continue next round without slip_stitch total 34 sts next round start to decrease and make the hole smaller… round 14 repeat *1sc* 9 times then repeat *1sc over next 2 stitches decrease * 4 times repeat *1sc* 9 times then repeat *1sc over next 2 stitches decrease * 4 times move stitch marker slip stich chain 1 total 26 sts round 15 repeat *1sc* 7 times then repeat *1sc over next 2 sts decrease * 3 times repeat *1sc* 7 times then repeat *1sc over next 2 sts decrease * 3 times slip_stitch fasten_off total 20 sts ***stuff the head and embroidery the kitty eyes and nose…etc *** body… starting bottom up round 1 with pink yarn magic_ring with 8 single_crochet stitches /or chain 2 then make 8 single_crochet in the first chain then slip_stitch to make a circle chain 1 round 2 repeat *2sc increase * 8 times total 16 sts put stitch marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 3 repeat *1sc 2sc increase * 8 times total 24 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 4 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase * 6 times total 30 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 5 back
